lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The freeze, which Finance Minister Bernard Chidzero said would check production costs and reduce the budget deficit, has been partly welcomed by business but criticised by workers whose real purchasing power has been severely eroded since 1980.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Inflation is hitting hardest those in the low income bracket which demands that any economic recovery programme should be biased in their favour," the union body said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "If those companies whose costs of production increase are not allowed a price increase, profit margins will again be severely squeezed, and this would negate current government efforts to revitalise the economy," the chamber said.
